availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: A. W. Earle (Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Earle. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Owned six enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned six enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 53B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 688.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 49.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 211.
"A. W. Earle (1815-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial #67527375, accessed April 18, 2018, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67527375.
